articles.title: Gaia space observatory maps nearly 2 billion stars in Milky Way galaxy
articles.description: Astronomers have mapped the most extensive atlas of our Milky Way galaxy yet, including the positions of nearly 2 billion stars. The European Space Agency's Gaia observatory also tracked the first visible measurement of the acceleration of our solar system.
